``` {r echo = F , message = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(htmltools)

member.table <- read.csv(here::here("MembersInfo_coords.csv"))
mem.ber <- member.table[!is.na(member.table$lat),]
points <- st_as_sf(mem.ber, coords = c("lon", "lat"))



leaflet(mem.ber) |> 
  addTiles() |> 
  addMarkers(popup = points, label = ~htmlEscape(Nombre),
             labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = F, direction = "auto")) |> 
  addCircleMarkers()
  
```
